meanings.definition: To breed from closely related individuals, especially over many generations.
meanings.sent1: The farmer inbreeds his cows to create a new breed.
meanings.sent2: The royal family inbreeds to keep their bloodline pure.
meanings.sent3: The cat inbreeds with its own siblings, leading to some interesting family dynamics.
meanings.sent4: Inbreeding in the animal kingdom can sometimes result in genetic mutations.
meanings.sent5: The practice of inbreeding can lead to health issues in the offspring.

meanings.definition: A person or animal resulting from inbreeding.
meanings.sent1: The inbreeds in the population show certain genetic traits.
meanings.sent2: The inbreeds of the litter had similar physical characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The group of inbreeds at the zoo always stick together.
meanings.sent4: The inbreeds in the family tree were easily identifiable.
meanings.sent5: The inbreeds faced challenges due to their genetic makeup.
